scripts.dev: parcel watch src/basil.js src/bot.js src/ranking.js src/lastgames.js src/buildorders.js src/crosstable.js src/stats.js src/index.js --out-dir assets/js --public-url /assets/js/
scripts.build: parcel build src/basil.js src/bot.js src/ranking.js src/lastgames.js src/buildorders.js src/crosstable.js src/stats.js src/index.js --experimental-scope-hoisting  --out-dir assets/js --public-url /assets/js/
